amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Forest Service recreation programs by $26 million and decrease Department of Energy petroleum technology programs by $53 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 35 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the National Forest System funding by $26,000,000 and to reduce funding for fossil energy research and development activities in the Energy Resource, Supply and Efficiency program by $53 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 276).
